original_title: Journey to the Docile Pink Planet
overview: A privately-funded 1960 expedition seeks to beat both the U.S. and the Soviet Union in the race to Mars. But what the intrepid explorers discover - changes everything. This film is a tribute to, as well as a send-up of, Classic Sci-Fi. The satirical references come thick and fast. But there's also a more serious message woven in.
title: Journey to the Docile Pink Planet
